products.title: Bella Blackout Indigo Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout indigo blue roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 9.60 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! This dark indigo blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller are great for privacy and light control.At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Bella Blackout Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout dark teal blue electric roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 138.17 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This moody dark teal blue electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their electric rollers are great for privacy and light control and as there is no need for a cord with this blind, this makes this blind inherently child-safe! 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This lush blue electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out their industry-leading sizesure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse their swifttrack blinds, for delivery next day!
